certificationApproved.bodyCopyOne: We see that you can clearly articulate your thoughts and experience. You're exactly the kind of panelist we hoped for!
certificationApproved.bodyCopyTwo: You will now receive invitations to Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies as well. These type of studies are better paid generally ;)
certificationApproved.subject: You did great in your practice study!
certificationApproved.title: Hey {{user.name}}, awesome job on your practice study!

certificationRejected.bodyCopyOne: We’re sorry to inform you that the practice study you submitted did not meet the quality requirements we demand for a Think Out Loud or Card Sort study.
certificationRejected.bodyCopyTwo: If you think this is a mistake or you would like a second shot, $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineContact) and we'll be happy to reactivate the practice study for you.
certificationRejected.subject: Your practice study was not approved
certificationRejected.title: Hi {{user.name}}, the practice study that you sent us was not approved

generic.newDetails: These are your session new details:

doubleOptIn.bodyCopy:
Please click on the button below to activate your account.
For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.
doubleOptIn.subject: Welcome to IntelliZoom Panel
doubleOptIn.title:
Hi {{user.name}},
welcome to IntelliZoom Panel!

excludedParticipation.bodyCopy:
We’re sorry to inform you that your participation in the study {{projectId}} hasn’t been approved and you won’t receive the study’s incentive.

This may be a result of one or more of the following scenarios:
  • You may have not been thinking out loud as required.
  • You may have not spent enough time performing the required tasks or questionnaires.
  • The technical quality of your participation may have been poor or incomplete due to one or more of these reasons:
    • Poor internet connection.
    • Poor microphone or camera quality.
    • Poor overall quality as a result of too many windows, tabs or apps running at the same time on your device.
To avoid this from happening again in the future, please review these best practice recommendations in our Help Center.

Don’t get discouraged! Next time, make sure your device is ready for the study and do your best to provide top-quality feedback.
excludedParticipation.subject: Your participation hasn’t been approved
excludedParticipation.title: Hi {{user.name}}, one of your participations hasn’t been approved

desktop.alternativeLink: And just in case the button above doesn’t work... here’s the link: {{confirmLink}}
desktop.oneMoreStep: One more step! Confirm your session
desktop.recommendations: Please make sure to be in the same device and WIFI connection that you will use to participate in the session.
desktop.thankYouForInterest: Thank you for your interest in this {{sessionDuration}}-minute session! You’ve selected the following day and time to participate:
desktop.youWillNeed:
For this study you will need:
  • Desktop computer
  • Latest version of Chrome, Firefox or Edge
  • Headphones
  • Webcam

generic.recommendations: Please make sure to be in the same device and WIFI connection that you will use to participate in the session. We recommend the use of a headset.

recommendations.environment: Please make sure to be in a well-lit, quiet environment with a strong connection.
recommendations.ics: We’ve also sent attached in this email an ICS so you can add this event to your calendar if you want.
recommendations.thatsIt: That’s it. 3 minutes before your session, you just have to click on…

participationConfirmed.subject: Participation confirmed! Your spot is reserved

paymentConfirmation.bodyCopy:
You should now have {{studyFee}} more in your PayPal account for:
{{user.email}}

This payment refers to the study: {{projectId}}
paymentConfirmation.subject: Your payment has arrived!
paymentConfirmation.title: Hey {{user.name}}, PayPal has just confirmed us that your payment has been received

paymentSent.bodyCopy:
We've sent {{studyFee}} via PayPal to the following email address:
{{user.email}}

This payment refers to the study: {{projectId}}
paymentSent.subject: Your payment has been sent
paymentSent.title:
Hey {{user.name}},
your payment has been sent!

paymentSent.note: Thank you for participating in the study {{projectId}}. Hope to see you again soon!

paypalToken.description:
We’re sorry to bring the bad news, but your PayPal account has been disconnected from IntelliZoom.

This means that you will no longer receive invites to paid studies and also that you will not receive any pending payments for studies you may have completed recently.

Please, to keep on participating in our paid research studies, or to receive pending payments, visit our dashboard and connect your accounts again.
paypalToken.title: Your PayPal account has been disconnected from IntelliZoom

practiceStudyComplete.bodyCopy:
We will review your participation asap and send you an email with the results.
If your participation is approved you will start receiving invitations to Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies.
This type of studies are usually better paid ;)
practiceStudyComplete.subject: Thanks for taking the practice study!
practiceStudyComplete.title: Thanks for taking the practice study!

reset.bodyCopy:
It's ok, we all do from time to time. Just click on the button below to set a new password and that's it. If you didn't make this request, please ignore this email.
For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.

studyComplete.bodyCopy: We'll process your payment for study {{projectId}} via PayPal to the same email account you used when registering in IntelliZoom Panel. This process usually takes 14 days. The incentive for this study is {{studyFee}}.

studyInvitation.bodyCopy: Are you ready to give your feedback and earn {{studyFee}}?

termination.bodyCopy:
Hello {{user.name}},

We have deleted your account and information from within our system. (This mail being the last communication you'll receive from us.)

If you did not request this, it may be due to a long period of inactivity or due to a misusage of our platform resulting in a violation of our $t(px-common:izPanel.common.termsLink).

If you think this is a mistake or would like further information, please $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineContact) or visit our $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineHelp).
termination.subject: Your account has been deleted
termination.title: Your IntelliZoom Panel account has been deleted
